inputs.name: mavenPOMFile
inputs.label: Maven POM file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the `Maven POM file`.

inputs.name: publishJUnitResults
inputs.label: Publish to VSO/TFS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to publish JUnit Test results produced by the Maven build to VSO/TFS. Each test result file matching `Test Results Files` will be published as a test run in VSO/TFS.

inputs.name: testResultsFiles
inputs.label: Test Results Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test results files path.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**/TEST-*.xml` for all xml files whose name starts with TEST-.

inputs.name: jdkVersion
inputs.label: JDK Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will attempt to discover the path to the selected JDK version and set JAVA_HOME accordingly.

inputs.name: jdkArchitecture
inputs.label: JDK Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the architecture (x86, x64) of JDK.

inputs.name: sqAnalysisEnabled
inputs.label: Run SonarQube Analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run a [SonarQube](http://www.sonarqube.org/) analysis by adding a sonar:sonar goal

inputs.name: sqDbDetailsRequired
inputs.label: The SonarQube Server version is lower that 5.2
inputs.helpMarkDown: If using a SonarQube server 5.1 or lower you need to specify the database connection details.

inputs.name: sqDbUrl
inputs.label: Db Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The database connection setting, i.e. sonar.jdbc.url. For example jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://localhost/sonar;SelectMethod=Cursor

inputs.name: sqDbUsername
inputs.label: Db UserName
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only The username for the database user, i.e. sonar.jdbc.username.

inputs.name: sqDbPassword
inputs.label: Db User Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The password for the database user, i.e. sonar.jdbc.password
